summary:
Add \"Another\" Daedric Artifacts in Skyrim!
They all have unique designs and effects.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/37196-1-1371193467.jpg[/img]

[font=Georgia][size=7][color=Red]-Description-[/color][/size][/font]

[size=5][FONT=Arial Black]This mod adds many \"Another\" Daedric artifacts.
There are spread all over Skyrim,find and use them![/font][/size]

[font=Georgia][size=7][color=Cornflowerblue]-Artifacts List-[/color][/size][/font]
[FONT=Arial Black]

[size=6][color=Magenta]-Acrobat Boots of Mephala-[/color][/size]
[size=5]The artifact of Mephala.
Her blessing allows you to move faster only in combat,and increases your stamina.[/size]


[size=6][color=Seagreen]-Berserker\'s Soul-[/color][/size]
[size=5]The artifact of Malacath.
The soul of berserker awakes when you are in danger.
It has flame power In low health,frost power in low stamina,shock power in low magicka.[/size]

[size=6][color=Crimson]-Daedric Executer-[/color][/size]
[size=5]The artifact of Dremora Lords.
The Battleaxe was made by Dremora to expol Viggilant of Stendarr,so it takes more damage to them,and traps souls.[/size]

[size=6][color=Wheat]-Hircine\' Horn-[/color][/size]
[size=5]The artifact of Hircine.
Lord of hunter takes more damage to animals,and beast humans.[/size]

[size=6][color=Cyan]-Hammer of Madness-[/color][/size]
[size=5]The artifact of Sheogorath.
It keeps mad power in itself,takes the effects same as Wabbajack.[/size]

[size=6][color=Orange]-Light Guardian-[/color][/size]
[size=5]The artifact of Meridia.
Her Blessing prevents any damage from undeads.And bashing shield takes fire damage in the daytime.[/size]

[size=6][color=Chocolate]-Mehrunes\' Nail Scissors-[/color][/size]
[size=5]The artifact of Mehrunes Dagon.
The nail scissors of Daedra lord cut limbs of enemy as nails,and cause disarmament.
And more,bleeding damage will take their life soon.[/size]

[size=6][color=Orangered]-Namira\'s Dinner Knife-[/color][/size]
[size=5]The artifact of Namira.
This starved knife takes more damage to human.And absorbs helath when you equip the ring of Namira.[/size]

[size=6][color=Mediumpurple]-Lord of Poison-[/color][/size]
[size=5]The artifact of Peryite.
This staff shoots poison spray,and ptotects you from any poison and disease.[/size]

[size=6][color=Lightslategray]-Kodachi of Betrayal-[/color][/size]
[size=5]The artifact of Boethiah.
The blade of betrayal has instant kill effect in 50%,only when you are not in combat.[/size]

[size=6][color=Palevioletred]-Ring of Azura-[/color][/size]
[size=5]The artifact of Azura.
Azura\'s curse absorbs a half of the enemy\'s soul when he dies,and gives Soul Trap effect you any attacks.[/size]

[size=6][color=Slategray]-Shadow Cloak-[/color][/size]
[size=5]The artifact of Nocuternal.
You become invisible when you sneak,but it absorbs your health while you are invisible.[/size]

[size=6][color=Teal]-Stick of Hermaeus-[/color][/size]
[size=5]The artifact of Hermaeus Mora.
The power of Hermaeus Mora occurs many effects at random.And you learn any skills quickly when you equip this staff.[/size]

[size=6][color=Paleturquoise]-Sanguine\'s Water Bottle-[/color][/size]
[size=5]The artifact of Sanguine.
It increases your frost resistance greatly,but decreases your stamina greatly.
The strange liqueur is supplied soon after you drink it,so you can drink it however many times,and whenever.[/size]

[size=6][color=Violet]-Nightmare Cuirass-[/color][/size]
[size=5]The artifact of Vaermina.
It is just a cuirass when you are rested well by sleep.
But when rest by sleep is out,it increases your attack and magic power,but decreases your health,stamina,magicka.[/size][/font]

[font=Georgia][size=6][color=Mediumspringgreen]-How to Get-[/color][/size][/font]
[FONT=Arial Black][size=5]I put txt file into zip file,read it if you want to know where the artifacts are.
If you feel troublesome to collect them,go to qasmoke and open \"ADA Chest\".[/size][/font]


[font=Georgia][size=6][color=Khaki]-Future Plan-[/color][/size][/font]

[FONT=Arial Black][size=5]Cravicus,Molag Artifacts[/size][/font]
author: metametroid
